website_summaries.verdict: Buyers give this box high marks for everything from its elegant look to its solid construction.
pros: Nice elegant look, and a solid build
8 compartments for tea, along with a built-in storage drawer
Features a framed acrylic lid, and magnetic clasps
cons: Some found this to be a little smaller than expected, while others claim that the box has a  bit of a "wobble" to it and doesn't sit flat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tea storage!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this tea box!! It fits so many tea bags and makes them easy to access even when you have lots of different flavors to go through!! Love the drawer! (I have used it for loose tea) Only thing I would say is that I wish it had somewhere to store the tea pinchers that come with it as the box is too short and they don't fit in the drawer when you have tea in there.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Robertson

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I've made on amazon. Holds a large assortment of teas and stevie packets in the little drawer. It's a beautiful box. One of those purchases that's not a necessity, but once you get it you're really glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: fits many tea bags! i love it. only downside is the plastic on the glass... it refuses to come off around the edges! drives my OCD insane.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great tea chest. Looks great and does the job. I enjoy the window on top and being able to store accessories on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Michael La Ronn

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my different flavors of tea. Like having everything I need all together in one container. Style looks nice in my counter. I even have a section where I can keep my infusers. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Display Piece
customer_reviews.text: I found the overall product nice and as described. It holds a good amount of tea bags. The drawer I've place empty tea bags.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: It holds a lot of tea bags
customer_reviews.text: This is a good purchase. It holds a lot of teabags and it is a good looking box.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Cool box.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a display box for sand dollars and sea shells and it's perfect. I also really like the tea bag squeezer.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Mann

customer_reviews.title: Middle front tea bag holder is shallow due to workable drawer
customer_reviews.text: The product also came with a teabag remover. It held all my teeth perfectly. It looks exactly like I expected it to. I wouldn’t buy another one and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kreole Gal

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that my teas are organized and I can find what I’m looking for in the box. I placed it on my counter and it looks nice not tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Tea box is as expected
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product for storing tea bags. Not sure of the usefulness of the small drawer but it is still nice. I recommend this box for storing your tea.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Great tea box! 📦
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bamboo box with easy see through lid. Love how much tea it holds. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Maiden of Laurus

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Well made; very nice for storingtea bags/serving tea. The drawer is a good size and holds my sugar tongs nicely.
customer_reviews.author: msmith

customer_reviews.title: This piece is beautiful. The spaces are just right for tea bags
customer_reviews.text: This piece is beautiful. The spaces are just right for tea bags. It will look lovely on my counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Tea is the only beverage I drink other than water so I like a variety to choose from and this tea case is perfect! Fits an average sized box in each slot. Well made, looks great. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Schlueter

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have so much tea and this makes organizing it so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: They are are so cool. Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: They are are so cool. Bought 2, 1 for me and 1 for a friend. Not for tea, we have another use for them. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: Love it—as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I love my tea box! It’s sturdy and fits a good amount of tea. The only improvement I would make is if the drawer we’re bugger in order to fit loose-leaf tea, but then you lose space inside the box for tea bags. The drawer fits small tea accoutrements—I have a little stir spoon and the tea bag squeezer it came with in there. I’m overall really happy with it—an elegant solution for tea hoarders like me, and a huge improvement from all my ziplock baggies inside a Tupperware lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packing  and low quality
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for quality don’t buy it. Also lid is very chip plastic and was damage. When you open the package is very unpleasant the plastic material it covers the tea box breaks in peace’s impossible to clean up without vacuum. I don’t recommended this tea box.
customer_reviews.author: Ines O.

customer_reviews.title: great tea box
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea box! It is perfect for storing all of my assorted teas. Good quality and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall look and idea of this tea box, however, the plastic covering on the clear part did not come off easily and I had to use a blade to get it off. There were also some imperfections in the clear part that I was hoping to get off with windex or scrape off, but to no avail. I loved that it came with a tea bag squeezer, unfortunately once you take the twist tie off, it no longer fits in the drawer. It only fit in the drawer diagonally to begin with. I will keep this as it works for my purposes, but I dont think I would give it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Briggs-Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Makes me look sophisticated!
customer_reviews.text: Cute little box for tea. Has some sections for teabags to be upright and some to be flat. I had a steeping ball which fit in the front drawer with the included squeezer. FYI the compartments are not adjustable, but I didn't have any need for that.
customer_reviews.author: Akshi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my wife’s birthday. I kept it in my office when I opened it before her birthday and took the protective stickers off the plexiglass cracked slightly and some of the adhesive will it come off with goo gone or any other product. The return window is closed and I’m stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Ian J. Lavelle

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our business center. We used it already and everyone loved being able to have hot tea on a cold evening while we learned about products and techniques. What a wonderful addition to services we provide for our clients!!
customer_reviews.author: Renelle Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, except for the defect ..
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, but the acrylic "glass" had 3 dents on the bottom portion after removing the film. I know, seemed odd to me too. However, a replacement will arrive tomorrow and this will be shipped back. If all is well, I will update this review with 4 or 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Skwoop21

customer_reviews.title: Very Unsatisfied Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy!! I bought this as a gift and was really excited when it arrived. I removed the plastic protective covering from the box and BOOM! The plastic lid was covered in scuff marks that totally ruined the look of what was supposed to be a beautiful gift. I tried cleaning the lid and adding in the tea I bought to go with it, hoping maybe it would improve the aesthetic, but no such luck. The scuffs are deep and numerous, leaving me a really unhappy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Tea Box
customer_reviews.text: It came with one of the wooden dividers inside already broken. I do really like this tea box though. My cabinet is neater. I was able to clean up some of the mess of half empty cardboard packages that cluttered up my shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Gloworm

customer_reviews.title: Nice box but wobbles.
customer_reviews.text: The box is sturdy and looks good but it doesn’t sit flat and has a wobble to it but it does serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: RobNMarj

customer_reviews.title: Nice tea bag storage box
customer_reviews.text: Nice tea bag storage box. Holds lots of tea bags. I bought this one because of the drawer but the drawer is not deep enough and falls out when I move the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: This is nice looking and seems well made. I really like it! Nicely made and good looking.
customer_reviews.author: K Chung

customer_reviews.title: Tea organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Not only was it shipped very fast and was as pictured but it holds so much tea. I love how sturdy it is and how well it organizes. I would highly recommend this product to people who drink alot of tea.
customer_reviews.author: sarah clifford

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This was absolutely perfect. Not only does it hold a lot, it looks really nice on the counter, rather than having so many boxes. I find that we all drink more tea now, which is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was an amazing purchase! I bought it for work and love everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie F

customer_reviews.title: Adequate storage.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, would prefer the glass look lid was maybe decorated/etched/or a milky glass. Also a bit darker stained wood would match my kitchen /dining room better, but it is very very useful and holds many tea bags and the little drawer holds my tiny tea spoons and squeezer. enjoy using it!
customer_reviews.author: K vink

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold the larger tea bags.
customer_reviews.text: Does not hold the larger tea bags, standing up which is what I was looking for. It will if bags are laid on side. I also thought I was getting an engraved box lid not a plexiglass lid. That may have been my mistake when ordering. All in all its not a bad box, just not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna s.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Didn’t notice any defects upon receipt. I have individually wrapped cube sugars so I use two of the spaces for that. All in all I like this tea box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a great tea chest.
customer_reviews.text: Good value. My only issue was that the clear plastic protective seal over the "glass" was a little difficult to remove - had to use a tweezers to pull the shredded edges out of the corners. Still love it and glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn L Robinson-Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This item was as I expected it to be. The only thing I would change is for the lid to stay open while it's being used.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: I have big fingers
customer_reviews.text: Yeah I like it, it’s great but it’s kinda hard to put tea bags in and out. While I was organizing packets in, I found it a bit hard to pinch them back out and just resorted to packing them in on their side instead of just faced down. But yeah its cute.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Arthur

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this purchase. I use it for my acupuncture waiting room and looks great. I'm very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.author: Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, Unique & easy access !
customer_reviews.text: It is so beautiful and easy access to view the tea and was made very well. It was the perfect Christmas gift. My Granddaughter was overwhelmed. It will be enjoyed for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer👍

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a broken, plexiglass lid. It feels flimsy. I understand you get what to pay for. I probably would have lived with the flimsiness if it wasn’t cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: No tea bags come with it.
customer_reviews.text: It was not clear to me that there would not be any teabags. I will relook at the site to see why I was confused.
customer_reviews.author: Llewellyn Eck

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for your mom if she loves tea!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother for Mother’s Day last year. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received the package in excellent condition and I love it, fits all my teas perfectly <3
customer_reviews.author: Keren Hapuc

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love my tea box, holds about 150 tea bags. And it’s a breeze keep organized and the bamboo it’s beautiful
customer_reviews.author: meghan gandy

customer_reviews.title: the wood
customer_reviews.text: as pictured . i have read the add over again. i think it should say . TEA not included. however! i did like it. i bought it as a gift. it is beautiful. the gift receiver, was very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap. Crack in the plastic window.  a lot of dust from the packaging
customer_reviews.text: I'm very unhappy with that. Looks cheap. Crack in the plastic window. a lot of dust from the packaging

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: just bought this, no complaints & it's pretty nice design

customer_reviews.title: I am using it as a spice box instead of ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using it as a spice box instead of a tea box and it works well. Wish there was a spatula in it.
customer_reviews.author: Divyajot

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used for tea bags. Great looking great product. Very pleased with my gift..
customer_reviews.author: Alg

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. I had to buy one for me .
customer_reviews.author: emt

customer_reviews.title: Handy little drawer
customer_reviews.text: Loved it and it’s sitting on my counter on Beautiful display

customer_reviews.title: Lovely tea box
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bamboo tea box. Love this product and I will be ordering more as gifts

customer_reviews.title: we like it
customer_reviews.text: we like it! we are planning in future to buy more. thank you
customer_reviews.author: david w. larson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Have been looking for something like this for a long time. And for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Pretty box with lots of space for a variety of teas. The clear cover is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shubird

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy using this Tea Box
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this Tea Box, good organizing for variety of tea bags. I store my little favorite rose buds inside the tiny drawer when I want 2 or 3 add to my tea. All in one case, fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this one
customer_reviews.text: It is really nice and so far I have gotten 3 compliments on it. One person liked it so much that they said it was perfect gift that they are going to give a tea drinking friend of theirs. The only small disappointment was that the drawer wasn't long enough to hold honey sticks but I found a cool think to put them in right next to the tea chest.
customer_reviews.author: Upgraydd

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with this purchase! It's well-made, the drawer opens and closes without effort, and I especially love the magnetic closure of the top lid. Cleared up tons of space in my pantry, and would look so cute on a coffee/tea bar!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Really nice tea box
customer_reviews.text: Smooth finish, not rough or splintery at all. I bought and returned a different box because its finish work was cheap — rough, glue spots, etc. This is simple but well done. Magnets keep the lid closed, and the little drawer has a magnet as well. Wrapped tea bags fit perfectly. I bought one for a gift and liked it so much, I bought one for my tea too!
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: wood rough and chipping with splinters, cover is a cheap plastic not glass
customer_reviews.text: Pictures look amazing, but I was quite disappointed by the quality of the item. The wood was not the smooth wood the pictures suggest and certainly not appropriate for a food-related item. The texture was extremely rough, had small splintering and sharp bits. I assumed the plastic, which seemed to be peeling at one end, was there to protect the glass, but in fact that was the cover- a rather tacky, sticky plastic. Much as I wanted to love this item, I had to return it. the tea squeezer however is really useful and has its own cute drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Myview

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to receive my new tea box, and it was more beautiful than expected. Unfortunately, although the plastic was covered to prevent scratching, someone had cut into it with a knife prior. There is one long cut on the edge and 2 scratches (in middle and on side) that were revealed upon opening. I can't stress how disappointing this tea box had been since it is SO BEAUTIFUL. Really takes away from what it can be.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianita Marisol

customer_reviews.title: For the price, definitely pass on this item.
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty decent. The clear coat and glue all over the plastic (not glass) cover is annoying. Make it look to be really poor quality. The box is decently built but again the clear coat is blobbed on with big runs so not very classy looking. It holds tea just fine, just not a great over all look. Oh, keep the twist tie for the tongs or they won’t fit in the drawer, super poor design.
customer_reviews.author: BMXER

customer_reviews.title: Organization feels good.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and looks so nice on the counter. Way better than random stacked cardboard tea boxes. The tea squeezer doesn’t really fit in the bottom drawer once it’s open but that’s ok. It should probably be in the silverware drawer anyway since it gets damp. Used the drawer for sweetener packets. Great tea box at a totally reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Ecbanli Bamboo Tea Box
customer_reviews.text: Has built in dividers for holding tea bags both upright and flat, a good arrangement for me. The only thing I would change, hence 4 stars, is that the drawer is very shallow, won't hold even my smallest tea strainer, even 1/8 inch deeper would make be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It certainly fit the tea for the most part. I don't know if I think it fit the fabled 120 tea bags but it fits a bunch. Where I'd take issue is the little pull out drawer which isn't long enough to fit a spoon size loose tea brewer. Looking at the photo and their little tea squeezer I though tit would be. Nope. It barely fits the tea strainer. Also the magnets are less than impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Narcissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: For the price this bamboo box is really lovely. It has a magnetic closure and a little drawer which contains a tea bag squeezer. One could alternatively store loose tea in the drawer. It nicely displays tea bags with an acrylic window.
customer_reviews.author: Redeyereader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tea chest
customer_reviews.text: Lovely tea chest. The little drawer holds tea tools and comes with a teabag squeezer. Beautiful chest to hold and display your favorite teas.
customer_reviews.author: Rhyiunne

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and stores plenty of tea!
customer_reviews.text: We are not huge tea drinkers but this case has organized our mess of teas and has actually helped us drink more since we can see what we have. It is a great little case!
customer_reviews.author: Mafe

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I e always wanted a tea box. This one has exceeded my expectations in the first try. It’s sturdy and well-made. I love it. The tea bag tongs are an absolute plus and the drawer for loose tea is BOMB! Great price Prime shipping. Love it! 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great compartment sizes and space.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me and my tea. Really nice compartment sizes...holds a lot of tea. The teabag ‘squeezer’ won’t fit back in the little drawer unless tied up and laying flat. The clear acrylic windows can be easily damaged with scratches.
customer_reviews.author: wilnetia

customer_reviews.title: Love this tea box
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for myself and I love it. My friend saw it and wanted one, I surprised her 6 months later for Christmas. We both love this tea box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size but lid not quality
customer_reviews.text: The plexiglass lid has a removable film that does not come off clean. One was scratched under it so I covered them with a printed window film
customer_reviews.author: Debra Corey

customer_reviews.title: great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. Win! This gift went over well. It's study, well made and designed really well. If you are a Tea Fan, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Steplander

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really love this tea box. Put my teas in and some other hot mixes. Just love it! The window makes it rleasy to see items. Thought it was glass, but isnt some kind if hard clear plastic, so works all the same.
customer_reviews.author: CadyRose Headings

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely constructed and attractive. Great way to organize all my tea bags!
customer_reviews.author: J. L. McCrimmon

customer_reviews.title: Ilike the compartments for different sized teabags.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting a box for teabags for quite some time, this one is really great.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Solid, spacious, No strong odors, pretty box, heavy, sturdy, magnets hold it closed well. Solid product

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Lid is thin plastic not glass. Came with scratches.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful enough for display on counter tops
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my tea drinking daughter! She loves it. Very well made! Beautiful enough for display on counter tops.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this item. I love all the compartments.

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, beautiful little tea box.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, beautiful little tea box. Took care of some of my clutter from too many kinds of tea boxes. ;-)

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo tea box is perfect!! Love the look and feel of it in my kitchen. I placed it on my baker's rack to organize my boxes of tea that looked cluttered. Holds all my tea varieties and looks beautiful. Great value!!

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great for tea lovers. Lots of storage and looks elegant enough to keep out and insight. Sturdy

customer_reviews.text: Absent the squeezer, this is nice and useful for guest presentation

customer_reviews.text: Finally got my large tea stash organized! This box really holds a lot of tea bags.

customer_reviews.text: Actually was exact ally what I needed. Love it, no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: I just received this the other day and love it. The quality is very good and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this the other day and love it. The quality is very good and it looks lovely. A much better way of organizing and seeing the different flavors of tea without having 5 boxes fall out of the cabinet. I'd highly recommend it.

customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He was very happy with it and loves it!! Thank you.

customer_reviews.text: Great tea box, holds a good variety and looks great.

product_meta.title: Ecbanli Bamboo Tea Box with Small Drawer, Taller Size Tea Bag Storage Organizer, Free Tea Squeezer Included
product_meta.description:
It's time to clear up tons of space in your pantry. Organize and show your favorite tea bags whether Tazo, Bigelow, Lipton, Tetley, Yorkshire, Twinings, or other tea brands with this elegant 100% bamboo tea chest. 

Best gift for tea lovers. When they receive your gift, they will "wow" your gift. It would look so cute on their coffee/tea bar.

Suitable for many occasions. This container can be used not only for tea bags, but also for essential oils, jewelry, spices or any other accessories & collections.

ECBANLI Bamboo Tea Box Storage Organizer Advantages:


 * 8 Storage slots hold more than 120 stand tea bags
 * 
 * Free tea squeezer made of premium stainless steel
 * 
 * Magnetic & transparent acrylic glass lid keep your tea fresh and easy to view
 * 
 * Easy to maintain and clean, simply wash with warm soapy water and air dry
 * 
 * Solid durable 100% bamboo wood
 * 
 * 100% brand new and 100% satisfied guaranty
 * 

ECBANLI are committed to providing our customers the highest quality products and service experience. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us, we guaranty a satisfied solution to you.
feature_bullets: THE FULLY UPGRADED TEA BOX - Taller than standard size tea box to accommodate standing or flat tea bag placement. Specially designed small drawers for store your loose leaf tea, sugar packets, spoons, squeezer and other accessories.

SPACE SAVING TEA BAG ORGANIZER - With 8 equally divided compartments, the tea box can easily hold 140+ tea bags and assemble tea bags into different categories with full display. The transparent, shatterproof acrylic glass lid allows you to easily make a choice before opening. Strong magnets in the lid and drawer hold the box closed and keep your tea fresh for months.
BONUS TEA SQUEEZER - Get a tea bag squeezer with every ECBANLI Tea Box, using premium stainless steel, get more out of your tea bag.

PREMIUM BAMBOO - Bamboo is an eco-friendly material which with beautiful wood texture. Each of our boxes made of the highest quality mature bamboo, means you can enjoy a long-lasting, solid wood product that won't harm our planet.
For ALL Tea Lovers - Impress your friends and family with this wonderfully crafted tea box for your home or present it as the perfect gift for tea lovers.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars243 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
